Work History  
 SALES ENGINEER EXPORT AFRICA      Apr 2018 - Present  
ProXES Group (Stephan Machinery; FrymaKoruma; Terlet)- Lognes- 77185- FRANCE  
As a company specialized in food processing, pharmaceutical, and health-care technologies, my responsibilities 
include: 
Development of a blank customer portfolio in West Africa (50% of traveling to Nigeria, Cameroon, Senegal 
Ghana and Ivory Coast). Researching and identifying potential customers based on the target market. 
Management of agents for Ouest Africa 
Active business development, providing technical quotes (long sales cycle: 6 to 12 months), mastery of the 
various processes of building an offer with risk analyses, monitoring of projects until the commissioning and 
start-up of the line. 
Project management with a project average of : 500K € 
Organizing technical equipment trials, running equipment checks and trials to ensure safety and 
effectiveness. 
Identifying sale possibilities and meeting the sales objectives as set : 
(2019 objective was 1.4M€ and I achieved 2.8M€) 
      (2020 objective was 1.5M€ and I achieved 1.6M€) 
      (2021 objective was 1.6M€ and I achieved 4.5M€) 
   
 SALES ENGINEER Jan 2015 – Apr 2018  
Parimix-Rueil Malmaison -92500 -FRANCE  
As a company specialized in the sale of industrial machinery for diverse industries including the agricultural and petro-
chemistry sectors, my responsibilities were: Overseeing any tender response process and providing technical quotes 
and estimates (dimensioning based upon on density and concentration levels, viscosity, and product grain size).  
Ability to quickly understand the client and system needs by working closely with the company sales and engineering 
teams, collaborating promotions and customer support. 
Providing updates on products and services to clients and company management In-house training 
received on product line specifications. 
Organizing technical equipment demos, running equipment checks and trials to ensure safety and effectiveness. 
Researching and identifying potential customers based on the target market. 
Recommending various improved materials or machinery to customers and clients by performing a cost performance 
analysis. 
Project management with a project average of : 100K€ 
  Identifying sale possibilities and meeting the sales objectives as set : 
  (2015 objective was 300K€ and I achieved 350K€) 
  (2016 objective was 400K€ and I achieved 450K€) 
  (2017 objective was 500K€ and I achieved 600K€) 

  
 DIRECTOR Oct 2010 - Dec 2014

Company bought by the 6th largest European car dealership (Mary Group) 
Company specialized in the sale of motorcycles, equipment, and lifestyle apparel, as well as repair of motorcycles. 
5 employees - Sales revenue: 350 K in 2011, 500 K in 2012, 600 K in 2013.

manager for local and nationwide markets
